allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Dutton Cavanaugh website local setup

- Set up Express server to serve static website files
- Downloaded and configured all website pages from duttoncavanaugh.com
- Fixed relative paths to absolute paths for nested pages
- Replaced Mapbox map with Google Maps embed on contact page
- Updated company address from 409 Airport Rd to 124 N Hill St, Griffin, GA 30223
- Configured proper URL routing for all service pages
- Added scraping scripts \(Python and Node.js\) for future updates
- All pages tested and working locally

Pages included:
- Home page
- Contact page with Google Maps
- About page
- Bookkeeping services
- Business services
- Tax planning
- Taxes page
- Practice areas

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
